data.name: AuthenticationTokenLifetime
data.value: Lifetime of the token

data.name: AuthenticationTokenLifetimeDescription
data.value: Specifies the lifetime of the token (in minutes)

data.name: AuthenticationTokenLifetimeRangeErrorMessage
data.value: AuthenticationTokenLifetime cannot be negative

data.name: EncryptionCertificate
data.value: ADFS Encryption certificate

data.name: EncryptionCertificateDescription
data.value: ADFS Encryption certificate

data.name: FederationEndpoint
data.value: ADFS Federation Endpoint

data.name: FederationEndpointDescription
data.value: Address of the ADFS federation endpoint (mixed/symmetric/basic256).

data.name: IssuerThumbprint
data.value: ADFS Signing Certificate Thumbprint

data.name: IssuerThumbprintDescription
data.value: Thumbprint of the ADFS signing certificate.

data.name: IssuerUri
data.value: ADFS Issuer URI

data.name: IssuerUriDescription
data.value: ADFS Issuer URI

data.name: JwtAuthenticationEnabled
data.value: Enable JWT authentication

data.name: JwtAuthenticationEnabledDescription
data.value: Enables the OAuth2 to ADFS authentication bridge

data.name: JwtAuthenticationEnabledRequiresFederationEndpointErrorMessage
data.value: FederationEndpoint required when JwtAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: JwtAuthenticationEnabledRequiresIssuerUriErrorMessage
data.value: IssuerUri required when JwtAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: PassThruAuthenticationToken
data.value: Pass-through authentication token

data.name: PassThruAuthenticationTokenDescription
data.value: If enabled, the original SAML token from ADFS will be passed back, otherwise the token will be converted to a JWT.

data.name: PassThruAuthenticationTokenRequiresIssuerThumbprintErrorMessage
data.value: IssuerThumbprint required when PassThruAuthenticationToken is false.

data.name: SamlAuthenticationEnabled
data.value: Enable SAML authentication

data.name: SamlAuthenticationEnabledDescription
data.value: Enables the OAuth2 to ADFS authentication bridge

data.name: SamlAuthenticationEnabledRequiresFederationEndpointErrorMessage
data.value: FederationEndpoint required when SamlAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: SamlAuthenticationEnabledRequiresIssuerThumbprintErrorMessage
data.value: IssuerThumbprint required when SamlAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: SamlAuthenticationEnabledRequiresIssuerUriErrorMessage
data.value: IssuerUri required when SamlAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: UsernameAuthenticationEnabled
data.value: Enable username/password authentication

data.name: UsernameAuthenticationEnabledDescription
data.value: Enables the OAuth2 to ADFS authentication bridge

data.name: UserNameAuthenticationEnabledRequiresUserNameAuthenticationEndpointErrorMessage
data.value: UserNameAuthenticationEndpoint required when UsernameAuthenticationEnabled is enabled.

data.name: UserNameAuthenticationEndpoint
data.value: ADFS UserName Endpoint

data.name: UserNameAuthenticationEndpointDescription
data.value: Address of the ADFS UserNameMixed endpoint.
